one_hole = ['A','D','O','P','Q','R']
two_hole = ['B']
zero_hole = ['C','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','M','N','S','T','U','V','W','X','Y','Z']
test_case = int(raw_input())
while test_case:
	test_case-=1
	count = 0
	d = raw_input()
	for i in d:
		if i in one_hole:
			count+=1
		elif i in two_hole:
			count+=2
		else:
			pass
	print count
	pass
